com.redhat.rhn.common.messaging

Interface EventDatabaseMessage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventMessage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CloneErrataEvent, NewCloneErrataEvent, SsmConfigFilesEvent, SsmErrataEvent, SsmInstallPackagesEvent, SsmPackageEvent, SsmRemovePackagesEvent, SsmSystemRebootEvent, SsmUpgradePackagesEvent, SsmVerifyPackagesEvent, TestDBEventMessage, UpdateErrataCacheEvent

    public interface EventDatabaseMessage
extends EventMessage
    A interface representing a class that can act on a EventMessage that contains a database transaction. We pass a Transaction into this EventMessage so the MessageQueue can *wait* on the caller's Transaction to finish before starting its work. This is useful if your Event needs to wait for the caller to finish writing things to the database.

      Get the Transaction from the caller/creator of this EventMessage.
